metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15680 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: If a valid external protocol handler was referenced in an image tag, theresulting broken image size could be distinguished from a broken image sizeof a non-existent protocol handler. This allowed an attacker tosuccessfully probe whether an external protocol handler was registered.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 82.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
